class.name: OScriptNodeArrayRemoveElement
class.description: This node attempts to remove the element specified by the [param element] pin from the [Array] specified by the [param target] pin. The [Array] is returned in the [param array] output pin regardless if the [param element] pin value is found and removed. If the [Array] element is removed, the output [param removed] pin will be [code]true[/code], otherwise it will be [code]false[/code].
